Articles.Content: Has anyone tested this on 1.12.3? I really would love something like this -- I haven't seen any other mod like it.

I fired up a pared down game (1.12.3) and it seems to be working fine.  I like to combine this and Kerbal Foundries tracks for mobile drilling rigs and large transport vehicles.



I'd forgotten about this mod, it's back in the mix now.  Thanks for the nudge!
